pr_title: #244 - work with Authentication.User instead of username

timeline.message: #244 - work with Authentication.User instead of username

timeline.body: @olenagerasimova meaning of "super" user is unclear. It seams that it's purpose is something like "any user" and is used specifically to check permissions for any user in `Permissions`. So I'd suggest to change the name and move the constant to `Permissions`
timeline.bodyText: @olenagerasimova meaning of "super" user is unclear. It seams that it's purpose is something like "any user" and is used specifically to check permissions for any user in Permissions. So I'd suggest to change the name and move the constant to Permissions
